Text:
can someone leave a comment if this has worked or not
this is my first time uploading and allready someone has said baton rouge and rodeo are not working
cheers chizzer666

Hey chizzer666
I see what's wrong with the other torrents-
For some reason it downloads simply as a "file" instead of a rar-
all you have to do is rename the file into .rar (make sure you put the "dot" before the rar)
This will make it into a rar file and it can be opened-
I do this all the time with downloads, and it works every time-
Cheers
SG
